Kim Se Gon

Korean: 김세곤

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Kim Se–gon
Native name:
김세곤
Birthday:
Oct 8, 2004
Age:
20 years old

Introduction

Kim Se Gon is a South Korean singer and dancer. He was first known for being a contestant on the 2021 reality survival show LOUD, however, he was eliminated in the first round.

In 2024 he joined the survival show MAKE MATE 1 but dropped out for unknown reasons shortly after the show began.

active
